messages.title: I want to hear from you
messages.content: Emily Benn encourages constituents to contact her with various options provided such as phone, email, and visiting the office.

messages.title: Secure it don't risk it!
messages.content: The leaflet suggests that voting for Emily Benn is the secure choice for the future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By 2014, an apprenticeship, training or study place is promised for every young person up to the age of 18.
Reinforce the investment and reforms that have delivered dramatic improvements for patients over the past decade.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Ease Pressure on Families in Poverty
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on helping struggling and workless families with affordable housing for all who are on low incomes.
Continue to take tough measures to combat Crime and Anti-Social Behaviour.
In an uncertain world, reduce dependency on foreign supplies, achieve power from renewable, cleaner and greener energy resources.

issues.economy: Throughout the economic crisis, Labour has provided help to the British people, ensuring they could keep their homes and jobs.
issues.health: A strong NHS is highlighted with Labour's investments delivering hundreds of new hospitals since Labour came to power.

housing.content: Focus on helping struggling and workless families with affordable housing for all who are on low incomes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will not let you down!

politicalExperience.achievements: The leaflet lists Labour's achievements including help during the economic crisis and investments in NHS and community safety.

contactInformation.address: EWAS Labour, 27 Brunswick Road, Shoreham-By-Sea, West Sussex, BN43 5WA

endorsements.endorsement: There's so much left to do to make the world a fairer place. It's your turn now!

quotes.text: I will not let you down!

images.caption: Emily Benn in front of Shoreham’s historic church.
Labour's achievements in supporting Britain through the downturn and a better NHS.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a personal appeal to the voter highlighting Emily Benn's commitment to not letting them down.
